long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform tweets into eye-catching images with PicTweet. This Chrome extension adds a simple camera button to every tweet, letting you capture and customize screenshots in seconds.
✨ What you'll love:

One-click screenshot capture
Beautiful preset color backgrounds
Custom color options
Clean, intuitive interface

Perfect for content creators, social media managers, or anyone who wants to make their tweet collections stand out.
FREE for now – Install PicTweet and give your favorite tweets the backdrop they deserve.
